venue.name: Revere Beach (in front of the T station)

item.description:
"Winter Has Gone to the Dogs" Dog Walk"

WHEN:  Sunday, March 11th at 11 AM (rain date March 25th)

 MEET:  At 11 AM at the structure/building on Revere Beach Blvd that is across the street and in front of the Revere Beach T station when looking at the station from the beach. 

Trip’s Leader:  Cedi (actually, my owner, Stephanie Mitchell), cedimeister@yahoo.com

EVENT:  Grab your favorite human and come enjoy a late winter walk on Revere Beach!  This event will feature plenty of frisbees, fresh air and fun for us (and some good social time for our owners).  Non-dog owners are also welcome (sorry, no cats!).  Don't forget your poopie bags!

RSVP: Not necessary - feel free to "just show up!"

COST: Free, plus $5 for members from Meetups that can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of only $25.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP directly to Stephanie for the plans

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: "Winter Has Gone to the Dogs" Dog Walk
